General.Name: Fujian Jinsen Forestry Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Jinsen Forestry Co., Ltd engages in the cultivation, construction, conservation, and protection of forest in China. The company also manages forests; and engages in the green, afforestation seedlings, sale of wood, and Chinese herbal medicine fields. It also provides bamboo, timber, and primary agriculture products; and invests in forestry and agriculture projects. Fujian Jinsen Forestry Co., Ltd was founded in 1996 and is based in Sanming, China. Fujian Jinsen Forestry Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of Fujian Jinsen Group Co., Ltd
General.Address: No. 50 Sanhua South Road, Sanming, China, 353300
